description: Wars, energy security fears, US-China rivalry and feuds over financing have undermined global climate diplomacy. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: The world is a mess. That makes the climate crisis harder to solve
title_page: The world is a mess. That makes the climate crisis harder to solve | The Straits Times
maintext:
NEW YORK - Global power is fractured. Temperatures have risen to record levels. Bitterness and anxiety are rising in vulnerable countries lashed by deadly heat and floods.
This week, as presidents and prime ministers assemble at the United Nations General Assembly, they confront a vastly different world from the one that existed nearly 10 years ago, when nations rich and poor found a way to rally together around a remarkable global pact.
